lead_paragraph: Luol Deng made a 3-pointer with 45.7 seconds left and the Miami Heat held on to beat the Sacramento Kings 112-106 on Friday night, avoiding a second straight late-game collapse.

headline.print_headline: Heat Blow Big Lead, but Hold On to Beat Kings 112-106
headline.main: Heat Blow Big Lead, but Hold On to Beat Kings 112-106

snippet: Luol Deng made a 3-pointer with 45.7 seconds left and the Miami Heat held on to beat the Sacramento Kings 112-106 on Friday night, avoiding a second straight late-game collapse....
